Description: For sale is a vintage Guild X50 cordoba archtop electric guitar. This is a X50 has a great sound and features a surprisingly strong and high output Guild style P-90 pickup. Made in Hoboken, New Jersey, this is a great example of the craftsmanship Guild's of yesteryear which are becoming increasingly popular. Structurally, this guitar is in great shape with no binding, bracing issues, and the top is not sunken in at all. This guitar has been professionally re-fretted and plays like a dream. The pickup and the electronics are original, but I just replaced the tuners with quality kluson tuners. The original tuners will be included in the structured bag that is included. The pots are original and work, but they are a little scratchy and some times the volume pot is a little finicky when set on 100% volume.The Brazilian rosewood fingerboard and bridge look and sound awesome. This is a great chance to get one of the rarer Guild models out there from a historic era of Guild guitars. The guitar will be professionally shipped and insured.Free Shipping in the Continental USA! Return Policy: We offer a 14 day return policy on all of our items. Because we offer free shipping on most items the customer will be refunded the total of the item minus our shipping costs, the customer must also organize and pay for return shipping (packed in the same manner as it was sent and insured for the same value). If you contact us within 48 hours of receiving the item and begin the return process there is no restocking fee. Past the 48 hour mark items are subject to a 10% restocking fee.
Title: Vintage 1963 Guild X-50 Cordoba Hoboken Era P-90 Archtop Electric Guitar w. Soft
